Uses of Package
org.drip.simm20.parameters

  • Packages that use org.drip.simm20.parameters 
    Package Description
    org.drip.simm20.margin
    ISDA SIMM 2.0 Risk Factor Margin Metrics
    org.drip.simm20.parameters
    ISDA SIMM 2.0 Risk Factor Parameters
    org.drip.simm20.product
    ISDA SIMM 2.0 Risk Factor Sensitivities
  • Classes in org.drip.simm20.parameters used by org.drip.simm20.margin 
    Class and Description
    CTSensitivitySettings
    CTSensitivitySettings holds the Settings that govern the Generation of the ISDA SIMM 2.0 Bucket Sensitivities across CT Risk Factor Buckets.
    IRCurveTenorSettings
    IRCurveTenorSettings holds the Risk Weights and Concentration Thresholds for each Sub Curve Risk Factor and its Tenor.
    IRGroupSettings
    IRGroupSettings holds the Constituent Single Curbe Tenor Settings and their corresponding Correlation.
  • Classes in org.drip.simm20.parameters used by org.drip.simm20.parameters 
    Class and Description
    BucketSensitivitySettings
    BucketSensitivitySettings holds the Settings that govern the Generation of the ISDA SIMM 2.0 Single Bucket Net Sensitivities.
    CTBucketSensitivitySettings
    CTBucketSensitivitySettings holds the Settings that govern the Generation of the ISDA SIMM 2.0 Single Commodity Bucket Net Sensitivities.
    CTSensitivitySettings
    CTSensitivitySettings holds the Settings that govern the Generation of the ISDA SIMM 2.0 Bucket Sensitivities across CT Risk Factor Buckets.
    FlatSensitivitySettings
    FlatSensitivitySettings holds the Flat Risk Weights and Concentration Thresholds for each Risk Factor.
    IRCurveTenorSettings
    IRCurveTenorSettings holds the Risk Weights and Concentration Thresholds for each Sub Curve Risk Factor and its Tenor.
    IRGroupSettings
    IRGroupSettings holds the Constituent Single Curbe Tenor Settings and their corresponding Correlation.
    LiquiditySettings
    LiquiditySettings exposes the Concentration Thresholds for each Risk Factor.
    RiskClassSensitivitySettings
    RiskClassSensitivitySettings holds the Settings that govern the Generation of the ISDA SIMM 2.0 Bucket Sensitivities across Individual Risk Class Factor Buckets.
    TenorSensitivitySettings
    TenorSensitivitySettings holds the Risk Weights and Concentration Thresholds for each Risk Factor and its Tenor.
  • Classes in org.drip.simm20.parameters used by org.drip.simm20.product 
    Class and Description
    BucketSensitivitySettings
    BucketSensitivitySettings holds the Settings that govern the Generation of the ISDA SIMM 2.0 Single Bucket Net Sensitivities.
    CTSensitivitySettings
    CTSensitivitySettings holds the Settings that govern the Generation of the ISDA SIMM 2.0 Bucket Sensitivities across CT Risk Factor Buckets.
    IRCurveTenorSettings
    IRCurveTenorSettings holds the Risk Weights and Concentration Thresholds for each Sub Curve Risk Factor and its Tenor.
    RiskClassSensitivitySettings
    RiskClassSensitivitySettings holds the Settings that govern the Generation of the ISDA SIMM 2.0 Bucket Sensitivities across Individual Risk Class Factor Buckets.
